channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Three Republican-led states to send hundreds of National Guard troops to Washington
item.description: Three Republican-led states are deploying hundreds of members of their National Guard to Washington to assist in the Trump administration’s takeover of the city’s police department.

item.title: Trump administration agrees to keep DC police chief in place, but with immigration enforcement order
Category 4 Hurricane Erin buffets northern Caribbean islands but not forecast to hit land
